Contains auto loader for lazy loading. Allows type based class fetching for loading classes from particular modules Can be accessed by the string 'loader'.

class test extends \sambhuti\core\container {
    static $dependencies = array('loader');
    public $loader = null;

    function __construct(array $dependencies = array()) {
        $this->loader = $dependencies['loader'];
    }
}
Array of [namespace => Path] for lazyloading
Registers loader::get() as the autoload method
Autoloader to load the classes under all lazypaths

tag.name: param
tag.description: name of the class to be loaded

docblock.long-description: Looks for a file and require_once it if it exists

tag.name: param
tag.description: partial path or classname to look for.

docblock.long-description: Looks for a class of certain type in all registered paths and returns the class name if matches else gives null

tag.name: param
tag.description: type of class to look for

tag.name: param
tag.description: name of class to look for

tag.name: return
tag.description: string full classname if class exists else null

docblock.long-description: Add single lazyPath for loader

tag.name: param
tag.description: the full path to the directory to be added

docblock.long-description: Get single lazyPath from loader

tag.name: return
tag.description: string path if $key exists else boolean false

docblock.long-description: Get all lazyPath from loader

Container for request and response objects Differentiates between web and cli request and populates the request object appropriately Can be accessed by the string 'request.*'.

class test extends \sambhuti\core\container {
    static $dependencies = array('request.request','request.response');
    public $request = null;
    public $response = null;

    function __construct(array $dependencies = array()) {
        $this->request = $dependencies['request.request'];
        $this->response = $dependencies['request.response'];
    }
}
Stores request data later passed to controller
Stores response data later passed to controller
Determines Command line or web request based on ISCLI constant and executes the relevant method. Initializes request and response objects
Implements abstract Get method Gives \sambhuti\request\request::$response on type 'response' and \sambhuti\request\request::$request otherwise
Parses REQUEST_URI to determine the command and returns other standard request parameters

tag.name: return
tag.description: list of options for request data

docblock.long-description: Command is always 'cli' gives 'argv' and 'argc' for request

tag.name: return
tag.description: list of options for request data
